name: Davide Nova
subtitle: Retail Marketing Director
about: Experienced Marketing Professional with proven track record in highly competitive business environments with premium branded products.Over the past +15 years i have been in charge of Brand Management, Product Innovation, Retail Marketing Strategies, Advertising development, Sport Sponsorship activation.Team worker and people manager, I believe in training and mentoring highly engaged people.I am passionate about Innovation Trends, Advertising, Sports Marketing, Brand Management.My goal is to create something relevant for people's live.
experiences: I lead a team of 24 professionals in developing and implementing omnichannel retail marketing plans for +40k PoS, coordinating with sales, store staff, and the product teams. We also organize B2C and B2B events, drive the innovation of the "MySisal" B2B service platform, oversee digital communication touchpoints (In & Out store), and manage the Food & Beverage offer.
Lead the development and execution of comprehensive retail marketing strategies, oversee the management of the Food & Beverage portfolio, and coordinate impactful video communication initiatives

Coordinated marketing and communication strategies for Sisal retail brands: brand positioning, annual marketing plans, development of adv and communication plans, sport sponsorship activation with top Italian Serie A clubs
Product Manager SBK Superbike World Championship

Developed marketing plans, coordinated international distributors, teams and sponsors, collaborated with the product development team, formulated advertising strategy and planning, and managed visual identity.

Provided support to the Marketing Manager in implementing an innovation project under the Bertolli Brand in the fresh filled pasta market, involving product development, pack creation, P&L management, and consumer and trade promotions
Managed press office activities and orchestrated the events for Sparco, ZF, Harley-Davidson, Sanyo, Peugeot, Nolan
